data.name: Red Algorithm - Book
data.detailed_description:
Double your skills training speed forever for all heroes in Red Algorithm with this book!

Details

  • This DLC doesn't contain any files to download, it just unlocks the book
  • To unlock the book with the DLC you need an active connection to Steam
  • You can see not-rounded hero skill points (the real number with decimals) in the game if you set "Nice skills" to "off" in settings

Here is an example of how it works. Let's say that we played a game in Hard Mode and managed to survive 11 minutes with a rifle. Each level with a rifle gives you +0.05 skill points in casual mode, +0.1 skill point in Hard Mode (our case), and with the book you will double that to +0.2 skill points per hero level. 10 levels (1st level doesn't count because you start with it) with a rifle would have given you +0.5 skill point in casual mode, but because it's Hard Mode we get +1 skill point, and the fact that you have the book makes it +2 skill points. 50 games like that and you get the maximum skill (100) with rifles. If this skill is the favorite one of a particular hero, you can double the training speed one more time!

This DLC doesn't make you stronger in the game, it just speeds up the skills training process and saves you time, so you can max out your favourite heroes faster and show the best you can do with all the skills.

You can also check out this guide to learn more about skills in the game.
